Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

We are not able to verify your account as a valid business, and your Ads will no longer pass the review until we verify your business.

how do I fix this

To resolve the issue with your account verification, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification:

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
- Business URL

Once we receive this information, our team will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
